portfolio.title: DirectDialogue
portfolio.description: A peer-to-peer multi-party chat application developed in Java incorporating a hybrid P2P architecture to form a scalable and fault tolerant messaging platform.

portfolio.title: StockCEO
portfolio.description: Stock tracking bot developed in Python using the discord.py API wrapper, allowing users to view & select stocks to track and set alerts for when said stocks reach a set price.

portfolio.title: UploadAI
portfolio.description: Automatically generates and uploads AI generated images to Instagram using prompts from OpenAI's GPT-4 model and image generation from DALL-E 3.

portfolio.title: Live to Eat
portfolio.description: Creation of a cookbook website using the Ruby on Rails framework. Allows users to view and post different recipies, with the ability to rate each others meals.

portfolio.title: Image Transfer Protocol
portfolio.description: A communication protocol designed in Java to facilitate the seamless transfer of images between a client and a server. Draws inspiration from the widely-used Transmission Control Protocol (TCP).

portfolio.title: Hangman
portfolio.description: Development of a Hangman game utilising the ARM (x32) assembly language. Includes low-level programming concepts such as memory management, system calls & stack management.

portfolio.title: Navigate
portfolio.description: Full-stack application developed using JavaFX and MySQL to implement a comprehensive Customer Relationship Management (CRM) system.
